about_the_game:
Enjoy the original game soundtrack for The Girl of Glass: A Summer Bird’s Tale, composed and produced by Fredrik Jonasson. The musical journey includes 18 tracks ranging from calming orchestral and piano music to the bombastic combat tracks, and of course the main theme sung by Marie Nilsson Lannerö. As a bonus, you will also find alternative versions of tracks that were not intended for the official release of the soundtrack!

Follow Kristal's adventure on this musical journey. The soundtrack is available in both high-res mp3 files and lossless FLAC files.
